Name: BREAK THROUGH
Requirements: Must be played in response to your opponent's successful Attack/Reactive Attack.
Rules: X=the amount of Power Dice used by both you and your opponent. Reduce incoming damage by X.

Name: SHIELD SIPHON
Rules: Destroy a Static Barrier within range, or an Active Barrier on an opponent within range, to Trigger: Create 1 Barrier.

Name: HIJACK
Rules: Choose 1 card in your opponentâ€™s hand and place it into their Cooldown Meter, Deactivated. Your opponent may then do the same to you.

Name: PAIN AND GAIN
Rules: Until the end of this turn, Gain 1 Fighting Spirit per point of damage Inflicted to you, in addition to your Rage.

Name: POWER LAUNCH
Requirements: Must be played in response to your successful Attack/Reactive Attack.
Rules: While resolving your Attack, you may Throw your opponent up to 2 hexes. If thereâ€™s another Forced Movement keyword in your Attackâ€™s Rules Text, ignore it.

Name: SPEAR
Requirements: Must be played in response to your successful Attack/Reactive Attack.
Rules: While resolving your Attack, you may Push your opponent +1 hex.

Name: REACQUIRE TARGET
Rules: Re-roll your Attack Roll.

Name: COUNTER CHAIN
Requirements: Does not affect Ultimate Techniques.
Rules: Until the end of this turn, add the Counter Subtype to 1 Attack Card in your hand or in play.

Name: COMBO CHAIN
Requirements: Does not affect Ultimate Techniques.
Rules: Until the end of this turn, add the Combo Subtype to 1 Attack Card in your hand.

Name: COUNTER BREAKER
Rules: Until the end of this turn, your opponent's Attack Card loses the Counter subtype.

Name: OPEN PATH
Requirements: Does not affect Ultimate Techniques.
Rules: Choose 1 of your opponent's Attack Cards. Until the end of this turn, that card loses its Rules Text.

Name: REFLEX EDGE
Rules: Cancel your opponent's Instant.

Name: REFLEX STRIKE
Requirements: Must be played before you begin resolving your Attack/Reactive Attack.
Rules: Choose 1 of your unresolved Attack Cards and return it to your hand, then replace it with 1 Attack Card from your hand. Pay or Gain the difference in cost to the previous card.

Name: SPIRIT FLARE
Rules: On your next turn you cannot play any cards or resolve your Upkeep and Combat phases, and during that Cooldown Phase, only Trauma Tokens will decrease Cooldown Slots. On the Upkeep of your turn following that, Gain 30 Fighting Spirit instead of choosing Heart or Power.

Name: SPIRIT SPARK
Rules: Gain 3 Fighting Spirit.

Name: TARGET LOCK
Rules: Your current Attack's successes cannot be affected by Instants.

Name: TRAUMA FLOW
Rules: Perform a Recovery Roll. On a failure, X=1. On a success, X=3. Move X Tokens from your Cooldown Meter to the matching Cooldown Slots of your opponent's Cooldown Meter.

Name: COMBAT FLOW
Rules: Choose X dice from your Attack Roll. Pay X to re-roll those dice.

Name: POWER FLOW
Rules: Choose X dice from your opponentâ€™s Attack Roll. Remove X Power Tokens from your Power Token Control to Trigger: Your opponent must re-roll those dice.

Name: BATTLE FOCUS
Requirements: Does not affect Ultimate Techniques.
Rules: Choose 1 card from your successful Attack. X=its cost. Gain X Fighting Spirit.

Name: PRICE OF POWER
Requirements: Must spend 4 Power Tokens to play this card.
Rules: While this card is Activated, Your opponent must spend 1 Power Token to Gain Rage. If your opponent Gains Rage, Trigger: Gain 1 Power Token.

Name: SOLDIER'S FOLLY
Requirements: Must spend 5 Power Tokens to play this card.
Rules: While this card is Activated, X=your opponent's Rage. Your Heart=X.

Name: TERROCH'S WILL
Requirements: Must spend 3 Power Tokens to play this card.
Rules: While this card is Activated, once per turn you may spend 1 Power Token to Trigger: Choose an opponent in an adjacent hex. Deactivate an Activated card in that opponent's Cooldown Meter.

Name: FALTER AND FAIL
Requirements: Must spend 3 Power Tokens to play this card.
Rules: Choose 1 card in your opponent's hand that is not an Ultimate Technique and place it into their Cooldown Meter, Deactivated.

Name: CORE STRIKE
Requirements: Must spend 1 Power Token to play this card. Must be played after you and your opponent have declared Attacks/Reactive Attacks.
Rules: Add 1 power die to your Attack Roll. X=the lowest die result from your opponent's Attack or Defense Roll. If successful, your Attack Inflicts +X damage.

Name: CORE SHOT
Requirements: Must spend 1 Power Token to play this card. Must be played after you and your opponent have declared Attacks/Reactive Attacks.
Rules: Add 1 power die to your Attack Roll. X=the lowest die result from your opponent's Attack or Defense Roll. If your Attack is successful, your opponent loses X Fighting Spirit.

Name: DECIMATION
Requirements: You may spend any amount of Power Tokens to play this card. X=That amount.
Rules: Your opponent must perform X Recovery Rolls. Per failure, your opponent must choose 1 card in their Cooldown Meter that's not an Ultimate Technique and permanently remove it from the game. After this card resolves, remove it from the game.

Name: PLACE OF POWER
Requirements: Must spend 2 Power Token to play this card.
Rules: Increase 1 card in your Cooldown Meter to Cooldown Slot 3.

Name: TERROCH'S CONTROL
Requirements: Must spend 2 Power Tokens to play this card.
Rules: Return 1 card from your Cooldown Meter to your hand.

Name: SPEAR OF THE ARMADA
Requirements: Must spend 6 Power Tokens to play this card. Must be played while you are the Active Player.
Rules: Take an extra turn after this one.

Name: ALL FIRED UP
Rules: X=the Fire in your Cooldown Meter. While this card is Activated, Gain X Fighting Spirit at the beginning of your Upkeep.

Name: HIT FOR HIT
Rules: Choose X dice from your Attack roll and re-roll them. If your opponent is able, they may also re-roll X dice from their Attack roll.

Name: HEAD ON
Requirements: You must be the Target of an Attack. Does not affect Ultimate Techniques.
Rules: Your opponent's Attack is automatically successful and is considered to have 2 successes. If you would Gain Rage, Gain Rage twice instead of once.

Name: NEVER BACK DOWN
Rules: Until the end of this turn, you cannot be Forcefully Moved.

Name: HOT-BLOODED
Rules: Until the end of this turn, reduce the cost of your Attack Cards by 2. Until the end of your opponent's next turn, your Defense is reduced to 0.

Name: CHANNEL RAGE
Requirements: Must be played in response to your opponent's successful Attack/Reactive Attack.
Rules: X=your Rage. Do not Gain Rage from your opponent's successful Attack. Your next Attack Inflicts damage+X if successful.

Name: CHANNEL SPIRIT
Rules: Spend X Power Tokens to Trigger: Roll X Power Dice. The combined total you roll=Y. Gain Yâ‹…1/2 Fighting Spirit.

Name: CRITICAL AIM
Rules: You or your opponent must re-roll 1 Die of your choosing.

Name: UNSTOPPABLE
Requirements: Must be played in response to your opponent's successful Attack/Reactive Attack.
Rules: X=the amount of Power Dice used for your successful Attack or Defense Roll. Gain Xâ‹…1/2 Power Tokens.

Name: HIGH STAKES
Requirements: Does not affect Ultimate Techniques.
Rules: Perform a Recovery Roll. On a success, you may play 1 Instant for free. On a failure, you must place 1 Instant into your Cooldown Meter, Deactivated.

Name: REBOOT
Rules: On your next turn you cannot play cards, resolve your Upkeep and Combat phases, and only Trauma Tokens will advance during your Cooldown phase. At the beginning of the following turn, remove all cards and tokens from your Cooldown Meter.

Name: NEURAL LINK DISRUPT
Requirements: Does not affect Ultimate Techniques. Must be played IN RESPONSE TO YOUR opponent declarING THEIR Attack/Reactive Attack.
Rules: Your opponent must return the cards comprising their unresolved Attack to their hand, then randomly choose and play a new Attack Card that they can legally play. They must pay or Gain the difference in cost to the previous card.

Name: BACKFIRE
Requirements: Does not affect Ultimate Techniques. Must be played in response to your opponent's successful Ranged Attack.
Rules: Your opponent must perform a Recovery Roll. On a failure, ignore their Ranged Attackâ€™s Rules Text and damage. It must enter their Cooldown Meter Deactivated.

Name: DEFLECTOR WAVE
Rules: Choose your or your opponent's Attack Card. That card is immune to Instants this turn.

Name: RE-CHAMBER
Rules: Choose 1 card in your Cooldown Meter and return it to your hand. Choose 1 card in your hand and place it into your Cooldown Meter, Activated.

Name: RE-ENGAGE
Rules: Place any amount of cards from your hand into your Cooldown Meter, Deactivated. Their combined cost=X. You may play any card in your hand whose cost is X or less, and is not an Ultimate Technique, for free.

Name: SURGE SHIELD
Rules: Pay 2â‹…X to Trigger: Remove X Power Surges from your Cooldown Meter.

Name: NERVES OF STEEL
Rules: Pay 2â‹…X to Trigger: Remove X Panic from your Cooldown Meter.

Name: FIRE CONTROL
Rules: Pay 2â‹…X to Trigger: Remove X Fire from your Cooldown Meter.

Name: TACHYON EMITTER
Rules: Until the end of this turn, your opponent cannot play Attack cards with the Counter Subtype.

Name: FEAR
Rules: Until the end of this turn, whenever your opponent Gains Rage, Trigger: Inflict 1 Panic to your opponent.

Name: SABOTAGE
Rules: When this card is Activated, place 1 Target Token on any Structure's hex. When this card returns to your hand, Destroy 1 Targeted Structure and remove the Target Token from play.

Name: INTIMIDATION
Requirements: Does not affect Ultimate Techniques. Must be played in response to your opponent declaring an Attack/Reactive Attack.
Rules: X=your opponent's Attack's cost. Your opponent must pay an additional X in order to play the Attack this turn. If the additional cost isn't paid, your opponent must return all of the cards comprising the Attack to their hand, regain the Fighting Spirit paid to play the Attack, and they cannot play those cards until the end of their turn.

Name: IMPROVISED OFFENSE
Rules: While Activated, while you're on or adjacent to Rubble, your Melee Attacks Inflict damage +2.

Name: SCORCHED EARTH
Rules: When this card is Activated, place a Target Token on any unoccupied hex. When this card returns to your hand, create 1 Inferno on any 1 Targeted hex, and Inflict 1 Fire to all adjacent hexes. Remove the Target Token from play.

Name: SUPPLY DROP
Rules: If you're on a hex with a Target Token, you may remove the Target Token from play to Trigger: Gain 3 Armor.

Name: GIGA AMP
Rules: If you're on a hex with a Target Token, you may remove the Target Token from play to Trigger: Gain 1 Power Token.

Name: GUERRILLA TACTICS
Rules: Activate any 1 Deactivated card in your Cooldown Meter.

Name: DOGS OF WAR
Rules: When this card is Activated, place a Target Token on any unoccupied hex. When this card returns to your hand, Inflict 3 damage to any 1 Targeted hex. Remove the Target Token from play.

Name: HACKED TECHNIQUE
Requirements: Does not affect Ultimate Techniques.
Rules: Choose 1 Attack Card from your opponent's hand or Cooldown Meter. X=its Rules Text. Replace the Rules Text of 1 card in your next Attack with X.

Name: SHIELD OF THE INSURRECTION
Requirements: Must be played in response to your successful Reactive Attack.
Rules: X=Your Reactive Attack's successes. Gain X Power Tokens.

Name: BULWARK
Requirements: Must be played in response to your successful Reactive Attack.
Rules: X=Your Reactive Attack's successes. Increase your robot's Defense by X, to a maximum of 5, until the end of this turn.

Name: PERFECT DEFENSE
Requirements: Must be played in response to declaring a Reactive Attack.
Rules: You may add your Robot's Defense dice to your Attack Roll, treating each one as a 10-sided Attack die.

Name: IRON CARAPACE
Requirements: Does not affect Ultimate Techniques.
Rules: Perform a Recovery Roll. On a Success, Cancel your opponent's Attack Card.

Name: TACTICAL INSTINCT
Requirements: Must be played after you and your opponent have declared Attacks/Reactive Attacks.
Rules: If your opponent's Attack Card has the Counter subtype, Trigger: Your opponent's Attack Card loses the Counter subtype until it enters their Cooldown Meter. Your Attack Card Gains the Counter subtype, whether you are Attacking or Reactive Attacking.

Name: ROAR OF THE ARMADA
Rules: Pay this card's Fighting Spirit cost + X. Perform X Recovery Rolls. Per Success, choose and Deactivate 1 Card in your opponent's Cooldown Meter.

Name: INTERCEPTOR
Requirements: Must be played in response to your opponent declaring an Attack/Reactive Attack.
Rules: Choose 1 Ranged Attack in your hand and place it into your Cooldown Meter, Deactivated. X=its Attack Die Value. Your opponent must perform X Recovery Rolls. Per failure, they must remove 1 Attack Die from their Attack Roll.

Name: FRACTURED OFFENSE
Requirements: Must be played in response to your successful Attack Roll.
Rules: X=the amount of Power Dice used in your Attack Roll. Perform X Recovery Rolls. Per Success, increase the amount of damage Inflicted to your opponent by 1.

Name: MED'RACHT'S MIGHT
Requirements: Add this card's Rules Text to the Rules Text of your unresolved Attack Card.
Rules: Your opponent does not collect Rage or Power from your successful Attack.

Name: BLOOD OF THE ARMADA
Rules: Pay this card's Fighting Spirit cost + X. Perform X Recovery Rolls. Per Success, your opponent loses 1 Power Token.
